data.description: Simple FTP client with TLS support
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Net::Lite::FTP is working but extremely trivial and easy to modify
    implementation. Useable, but definitely not-complete, and
    completness is not a goal. Net::Lite::FTP has minimal dependencies,
    linecount is and is supposed to stay low, primary design concernes
    were TLS support and embedding (think PAR). Net::Lite::FTP is
    expected to help develop new firewall-piercing features of ftp.
